revision.text:
[[File:ThunderStone.jpeg|thumb|200px|The Thunder Stone]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Thunder Stone costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Vermillion City]] in [[Kanto]]. It can also be mined from the [[Underground]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Pikachu.png|40px]] Pikachu || [[File:Raichu.png|40px]] Raichu |- | [[File:Eevee.png|40px]] Eevee || [[File:Jolteon.png|40px]] Jolteon |- | [[File:Eelektrik.png|40px]] Eelektrik || [[File:Eelektross.png|40px]] Eelektross |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
